name: Secure Messaging
description: Ensuring confidentiality and integrity in intelligence communications.

cards.title: One-Time Pads and Unbreakable Encryption
cards.description: Using disposable encryption keys for ultra-secure communication.
bulletpoints: Understand the principles of perfect secrecy
Generate and distribute one-time pad keys securely
Apply OTP encryption and decryption techniques manually
cards.summaryText: Pair perfectly random pads with disciplined key handling to keep messages mathematically unbreakable.

cards.title: Burner Devices and Secure Channels
cards.description: Using disposable communication methods to avoid tracking and interception.
bulletpoints: Select secure devices and operating systems
Deploy encrypted messaging platforms (Signal, Tails OS, ProtonMail)
Implement compartmentalization techniques to protect identity
cards.summaryText: Cycle hardened burner hardware, encrypted apps, and strict compartmentalization to dodge surveillance.
